mapper.sql: m.TCI_ID, m.TCI_Swift_Number, m.TCI_State, m.TCI_Table_ID, m.TCI_Customer_ID, m.TCI_Mem_ID, m.TCI_Waiter_ID, m.TCI_Dish_Nums, m.TCI_Amount_Peoplo, m.TCI_Repast_Time, m.TCI_Consume_Amount, m.TCI_Cost_Amount, m.TCI_Discount, m.TCI_Remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
, , ,
f. TCC_ID,f.TCC_Total_Price,f.TCC_Dish_ID,fi.dish_Id,fi.dish_Name,fi.dish_price,si.table_Id,si.table_Name,si.table_state, se.employee_Id as Waiter_employee_Id,se.employee_Name as Waiter_employee_Name,ei.customer_Id,ei.customer_Name,ei.customer_Tel,ei .customer_Gender,ni.mem_ID,ni.mem_Name,ni.mem_User_Name,ni.mem_Tel,ni.mem_Gender from t_tempcarteinfo m
LEFT JOIN t_endCarteContent f ON m.TCI_ID=f.TCC_TCI_ID LEFT JOIN t_dish fi ON f.TCC_Dish_Id=fi.dish_id LEFT JOIN t_dinningTable si ON m.TCI_Table_ID=si.table_ID LEFT JOIN t_EmployeeInfo se ON m.TCI_Waiter_ID=se.employee_Id LEFT JOIN t_Customer ei ON m.TCI_Customer_ID=ei.Customer_ID LEFT JOIN t_MemberInfo ni ON m.TCI_Mem_ID=ni.Mem_ID
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.delete: delete m from t_tempcarteinfo m where TCI_ID = #{tciId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_tempcarteinfo (TCI_ID, TCI_Swift_Number, TCI_State, TCI_Table_ID, TCI_Customer_ID, TCI_Mem_ID, TCI_Waiter_ID, TCI_Dish_Nums, TCI_Amount_Peoplo, TCI_Repast_Time, TCI_Consume_Amount, TCI_Cost_Amount, TCI_Discount, TCI_Remark, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy) values (#{tciId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciSwiftNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tciState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{dinningTable.tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customer.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberInfo.memId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciWaiter.employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciDishNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciAmountPeoplo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tciRepastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tciConsumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tciCostAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tciDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tciRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{user.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

TCI_ID,

mapper.update:
update t_tempcarteinfo m
TCI_ID = #{record.tciId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Swift_Number = #{record.tciSwiftNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TCI_State = #{record.tciState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
TCI_Table_ID = #{record.dinningTable.tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Customer_ID = #{record.customer.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Mem_ID = #{record.memberInfo.memId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Waiter_ID = #{record.tciWaiter.employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Dish_Nums = #{record.tciDishNums,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Amount_Peoplo = #{record.tciAmountPeoplo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Repast_Time = #{record.tciRepastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TCI_Consume_Amount = #{record.tciConsumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TCI_Cost_Amount = #{record.tciCostAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TCI_Discount = #{record.tciDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TCI_Remark = #{record.tciRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_Flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
last_SubTime = #{record.lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
subBy = #{record.user.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update t_tempcarteinfo m set TCI_ID = #{record.tciId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Swift_Number = #{record.tciSwiftNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TCI_State = #{record.tciState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TCI_Table_ID = #{record.dinningTable.tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Customer_ID = #{record.customer.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Mem_ID = #{record.memberInfo.memId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Waiter_ID = #{record.tciWaiter.employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Dish_Nums = #{record.tciDishNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Amount_Peoplo = #{record.tciAmountPeoplo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Repast_Time = #{record.tciRepastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TCI_Consume_Amount = #{record.tciConsumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TCI_Cost_Amount = #{record.tciCostAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TCI_Discount = #{record.tciDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TCI_Remark = #{record.tciRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_Flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_SubTime = #{record.lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{record.user.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

TCI_Swift_Number = #{tciSwiftNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TCI_State = #{tciState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
TCI_Table_ID = #{dinningTable.tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Customer_ID = #{customer.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Mem_ID = #{memberInfo.memId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Waiter_ID = #{tciWaiter.employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Dish_Nums = #{tciDishNums,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Amount_Peoplo = #{tciAmountPeoplo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TCI_Repast_Time = #{tciRepastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TCI_Consume_Amount = #{tciConsumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TCI_Cost_Amount = #{tciCostAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TCI_Discount = #{tciDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TCI_Remark = #{tciRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_Flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},

subBy = #{user.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where TCI_ID = #{tciId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_tempcarteinfo set TCI_Swift_Number = #{tciSwiftNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TCI_State = #{tciState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TCI_Table_ID = #{dinningTable.tableId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Customer_ID = #{customer.customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Mem_ID = #{memberInfo.memId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Waiter_ID = #{tciWaiter.employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Dish_Nums = #{tciDishNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Amount_Peoplo = #{tciAmountPeoplo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCI_Repast_Time = #{tciRepastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TCI_Consume_Amount = #{tciConsumeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TCI_Cost_Amount = #{tciCostAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TCI_Discount = #{tciDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TCI_Remark = #{tciRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_Flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_SubTime = #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{user.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where TCI_ID = #{tciId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
